item.title: CVE-2024-24941|2024-02-06T09:21:30.981Z -- JetBrains -- IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.3.3 a plugin for JetBrains Space was able to send an authentication token to an inappropriate URL

item.title: CVE-2024-24940|2024-02-06T09:21:30.488Z -- JetBrains -- IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.3.3 path traversal was possible when unpacking archives
